settings.title: This One Ingredient Could Transform Your Skin Forever
settings.content: What if your moisturizer was actually making your skin worse? One single ingredient could be the solution your skin has been begging for. See why thousands of women are turning to Super Tallow for soft, hydrated skin.

settings.title: Struggling With Dry, Irritated Skin? Here's What No One Tells You...

settings.content:
If your skin feels constantly dry no matter what you use, gets worse
during winter, or reacts to almost every product... you might be missing
one crucial element your skin desperately needs.

It’s easy to think this is just part of getting older, dealing with winter weather, or having “sensitive skin.”

But what if the real problem isn’t your skin – but what you're putting on it?
settings.quoted:
Most moisturizers rely on water, cheap fillers,
and synthetic ingredients that sit on the surface of your skin without
truly nourishing it. Even the most expensive creams can’t fix dry skin
if they’re missing the essential nutrients your skin craves.

Here’s the surprising part: There is one simple
ingredient that’s been used for centuries to deeply hydrate and repair
skin... but it’s been overlooked by modern skincare.

settings.title: In Fact, This Simple Ingredient Has Been Shown To...

settings.text_1: Repair damaged skin  caused by weather, age, and over-washing.
settings.text_2: Reduce redness, irritation, and sensitivity – perfect for those with delicate skin.
settings.text_3: Deeply hydrate without clogging pores, making it ideal for all skin types.
settings.text_4: Promote faster healing of cracked, dry skin and minor wounds.
settings.text_5: Deliver essential vitamins like A, D, E, and K directly to your skin.

settings.title: Meet Super Tallow – The Solution Your Skin Has Been Waiting For
settings.subtitle: Hydrate, heal, and protect your skin with the only nutrient-rich moisturizer your skin will ever need.Say goodbye to endless products – one simple ingredient is all your skin needs.

settings.content:
Super Tallow is more than just another moisturizer – it’s a nutrient-rich, single-ingredient solution sourced from 100% grass-fed beef tallow.

Here’s why it works:

  • Mimics the skin’s natural oils for deep, long-lasting hydration.
  • Packed with vitamins A, D, E, and K to repair, nourish, and protect your skin.
  • Free from synthetic fillers, fragrances, and seed oils – just pure, effective skincare.

But wait...

But not all tallow is created equal.

Most tallow products on the market are poorly sourced, have strong odors, and leave a greasy residue that never fully absorbs. Super Tallow is made from 100% grass-fed cows, with a gentle process that preserves nutrients for your skin.

Your skin deserves the best – and Super Tallow delivers.

settings.title: The Smarter, Natural Choice for Healthier Skin
Truly Unscented – A clean, natural moisturiser with no overpowering scent.
Deep Hydration – Locks in moisture for soft, smooth, and radiant skin.
Single-Ingredient Purity – Made from 100% grass-fed beef tallow, free of additives.

settings.ctm_description:
Made from grass-fed beef tallow, this single-ingredient moisturizer nourishes deeply, leaving your skin soft, smooth, and radiant.

Super Tallow™ Facial Moisturizer
